api.gbuild

Class GComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.gbuild.GComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GContainer, GImage, GText

    public abstract class GComponent
extends Object
    Definition of a graphical component
    Author:
    David

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GComponent(processing.core.PApplet manager) 
      GComponent(processing.core.PApplet manager, GComponent parent) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      processing.core.PVector dim()
      Return the dimension for current component.
      void dim(Float... dimensions)
      Specify the dimension for current component.
      void dim(Integer... dimensions)
      Specify the dimension for current component.
      abstract void draw()
      Draw current component The drawing would be affected by the visible state of the component, that could be customized using setVisible
      boolean isVisible()
      Check if component is visible
      processing.core.PApplet manager()
      Get the manager for current component.
      processing.core.PVector pos()
      Return the location for current component.
      void pos(Float... coords)
      Specify the location for current component It is possible to define the location in three different ways: 1) pos(x, y) when (x, y) will be set 2) pos(x) when x will be set 3) pos(null, y) when y will be set
      void pos(Integer... coords)
      Specify the location for current component It is possible to define the location in three different ways: 1) pos(x, y) when (x, y) will be set 2) pos(x) when x will be set 3) pos(null, y) when y will be set
      void setVisible(boolean isVisible)
      Specify if current component will be visible.

    • Method Detail

      • manager

        public processing.core.PApplet manager()
        Get the manager for current component.
        Returns:
        Processing applet

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Check if component is visible
        Returns:
        visible state

      • pos

        public void pos(Integer... coords)
        Specify the location for current component It is possible to define the location in three different ways: 1) pos(x, y) when (x, y) will be set 2) pos(x) when x will be set 3) pos(null, y) when y will be set
        Parameters:
        coords - coordinates (x, y)

      • pos

        public void pos(Float... coords)
        Specify the location for current component It is possible to define the location in three different ways: 1) pos(x, y) when (x, y) will be set 2) pos(x) when x will be set 3) pos(null, y) when y will be set
        Parameters:
        coords - coordinates (x, y)

      • dim

        public void dim(Integer... dimensions)
        Specify the dimension for current component. It is possible to define the location in three different ways: 1) pos(w, h) when (w, h) will be set 2) pos(w) when w will be set 3) pos(null, h) when h will be set
        Parameters:
        dimensions - dimension (w, h)

      • dim

        public void dim(Float... dimensions)
        Specify the dimension for current component. It is possible to define the location in three different ways: 1) pos(w, h) when (w, h) will be set 2) pos(w) when w will be set 3) pos(null, h) when h will be set
        Parameters:
        dimensions - dimension (w, h)

      • pos

        public processing.core.PVector pos()
        Return the location for current component. It is important to know that the vector that is returned is a copy of current attribute, so you cannot change the location using this variable
        Returns:
        a new instance for current position

      • dim

        public processing.core.PVector dim()
        Return the dimension for current component. It is important to know that the vector that is returned is a copy of current attribute, so you cannot change the dimension using this variable
        Returns:
        a new instance for current dimension

      • setVisible

        public void setVisible(boolean isVisible)
        Specify if current component will be visible. The draw method would hide the component whether is called setVisible(false)
        Parameters:
        isVisible - variable to specify if component is visible

      • draw

        public abstract void draw()
        Draw current component The drawing would be affected by the visible state of the component, that could be customized using setVisible
